quotes.quote: When you can't change the direction of the wind - adjust your sails.
It doesn’t matter who you are, where you come from. The ability to triumph begins with you. Always.
I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
What we think determines what happens to us, so if we want to change our lives, we need to stretch our minds.
There is no passion to be found playing small-in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.

The most difficult thing is the decision to act, the rest is merely tenacity. The fears are paper tigers. You can do anything you decide to do. You can act to change and control your life; and the procedure, the process is its own reward.
My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humor, and some style.
Although the world is full of suffering, it is also full of the overcoming of it.
We must accept finite disappointment, but we must never lose infinite hope.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising up every time we fall.
It doesn’t matter how slow you go as long as you don’t stop.
Life is a series of natural and spontaneous changes. Don't resist them-that only creates sorrow. Let reality be reality. Let things flow naturally forward in whatever way they like.
In the end, it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
I've failed over and over and over again in my life and that is why I succeed.
The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.
Life is not about how fast you run or how high you climb, but how well you bounce.
Life is 10 percent what happens to you and 90 percent how you respond to it.

Our greatest happiness does not depend on the condition of life in which chance has placed us, but is always the result of a good conscience, good health, occupation, and freedom in all just pursuits.
Remember your dreams and fight for them. You must know what you want from life. There is just one thing that makes your dream become impossible: the fear of failure.
Life takes on meaning when you become motivated, set goals and charge after them in an unstoppable manner.

Today is life-the only life you are sure of. Make the most of today. Get interested in something. Shake yourself awake. Develop a hobby. Let the winds of enthusiasm sweep through you. Live today with gusto.

Breath .. you're going to be ok, you've been here before.. you've been this scared, uncomfortable and anxious and know you can survive this too..I know it all feels unbearable right now, just breath, keep breathing..this too shall pass I promise.
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
Victory comes from finding opportunities in problems.
Victory is not the absence of problems, it is the presence of power.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
Embrace uncertainty. Some of the most beautiful chapters in our lives won’t have a title until much later.
Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
